item.title: Starting Screen in Detach Mode
item.description: For a few days I’ve been thinking about GNU/screen. I have some scripts that should be run inside screen everytime a reboot happened. I’ve been looking in stackoverflow, google, etc but haven’t found anything useful. So I’ve been stuck with this kind of script: $ screen -dmS screen_name some_command It will create a new screen, run the command inside it and detach the screen. Well, it’s pretty good actually. But, when the command is done (finished or killed) then the screen will be terminated.
